snippet.title: Discolored - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Discolored is a first person puzzle adventure game where all the colors have gone missing and it's up to you to bring them back!  Available now on Steam and Apple Arcade!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/933860/Discolored/
Apple Arcade: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/discolored/id1479350739
A big thank you to Joshua Cauller for putting this trailer together!
